verbose_text: Interestingly, in addition to direct nucleic acid binding (reviewed above), PrP binds tightly to Abeta, PrP and Abeta are codeposited in both AD and TSE brain, and PrP modulates the generation and fibrillization of Abeta, reinforcing the idea that both PrP and Abeta are components of the innate immune system.
evidence: PrP modulates the generation and fibrillization of Abeta
